mention.text: 13 nov 89 -- we reaffirm our appeal to humanitarian organizations , the oas , and democratic governments , and we make a special call to costa rican president oscar arias , nobel peace prize laureate , to contact the cristiani government and the high command of the fascist armed forces to pressure them to stop their bombings
the cristiani government and the high command of the fascist armed forces
